content: my favorite vanilla socks by meaghan schmaltz the story when i started out fiendishly knitting socks i hated the gusset heel all i wanted to knit was a short row heel sock from the toe up having learned a gusset heel and found one i love love love i almost exclusively knit cuff-down socks with a gusset heel they are my favorite tv time knitting even when watching the walking dead though nothing interrupts game of thrones so here they are my favorite vanilla socks period materials fingering weight yarn 400 yds per 100g us 2 2 75mm 32-inch circular needle or preferred length adjust needle size as necessary to match gauge removable stitch marker 1 stitch markers 2 finished sizes 7½ 8½ 9⅔ inch circumference recommended fit 1-inch neg ease gauge 30 sts and 42 row = 4 inches stockinette in the round stitch glossary beg of round - beginning of round notes decrease - decreased these socks are worked from the cuff down feature a modified eye increase - increased of partridge gusset heel and use the kitchener stitch to close the toe k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together 1 st decrease this pattern includes written instructions only make 2 socks to p - purl complete a pair p2tog - purl 2 sts together 1 st decrease repeat repeat instructions are given for smallest size with additional sizes in rh - right hand parentheses when only one set of instructions is given it applies to round s - round s all sizes rs right side sl slip_stitch slip all sts purlwise unless otherwise noted ssk - slip 1 stitch knitwise slip a second stitch knitwise move these 2 stitches back to the left needle and k2tog tbl this pattern is written for the magic loop technique however any 1 st decrease method of circular knitting may be substituted in case of using st s stitch es dpns assume that the front needle is synonymous with needles 1 & tbl through back loop 2 and that the back needle is synonymous with needles 3 & 4 ws wrong side note if you use a lighter-weight sock yarn such as 462 yds/100g i recommend going down one needle size and going up one size in the instructions for example i knit a 56 st size sock on us 2 needles with 400 yds/100g yarn but knit a 64 st size sock on us 1 needles with a 462 yds/100g yarn if you find any errors or have any questions please feel free to e-mail me directly meaghan@unapologeticknitter com page 1 of 2 @notsorryknitter on ravelry instagram ello & twitter | unapologeticknitter com | the unapologetic knitter on facebook & youtube cuff work the gusset cast on 56 64 72 sts loosely using your preferred method round 1 needle 1 knit to 2 sts before marker ssk sm knit to end divide the sts evenly place the first 28 32 36 sts on the front round 1 needle 2 knit
